DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine whether electronic feedback general practitioner quality Type 2-Diabetes care increase quality care measure process outcome measure contain national guideline . Effect evaluation perform use mixed method design .
DOC.brief_title: Electronic Feedback Diabetic Care General Practitioners
DOC.detailed_description: Background : In effort optimize diabetes care general practice , electronical feedback system develop . The system evaluate quantitative qualitative . Method : The general practitioner ( GP´s ) Region Southern Denmark randomise either admission admission electronic feedback system . The system launch 1/3-2007 ran one year prior evaluation . Quantitative evaluation assessment follow end-points : Patients Hba1c-level , number patient hba1c-level measure within last year , cholesterol-level number patient eye examination within last year . Qualitative evaluation interview GP´s admission system . Qualitative data collect interview intervention GPs , design uncover motivational factor well barrier concern use feedback chronic care general practice . Data analyze . Quantitative data gather . Perspective : This project shed light value electronic feedback system within chronic care general practice . Based project possible set system automatic electronic monitoring feedback quality care general practice , take motivational factor GP account implementation .
DOC.criteria: Prevalent Type 2diabetes confirm Primary Care Physician . Patient alive throughout intervention period . GP actively work throughout intervention period ( retire ) . Exclusion criterion : death intervention move geographic area intervention GP retire intervention
